EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Emily, Thanks so much for getting back to me. While you are growing your business you can review our “Independence Guide” by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> I think you would find the contente here helpful! Best wishes in 2013, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Emily White [mailto:emily.white@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 02, 2013 12:01 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: John Blum Subject: Re: MBO Partners Thank you for writing.I reviewed your site a few days ago and my business is WAY too small to participate.I am following the advice on your site based on the info I imported.Thank you though.Hopefully some other time!Happy New YearEmily From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "emily.white@yahoo.com <mailto:emily.white@yahoo.com>" <emily.white@yahoo.com <mailto:emily.white@yahoo.com>> Sent: Wednesday, January 2, 2013 8:53 AM Subject: MBO Partners Dear Emily , Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from John Blum. John has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCflxQuV44%2FPSQNqzNhjTIdZfmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable.
